website_summaries.verdict: Snug fit in a glove that is designed to perform in all weather conditions.
pros: Elite offers a 100% money back guarantee
Specialty stitching at all of the pressure points gives this glove a long lifespan
Offered in 8 sizes, including youth and adult options
Exceptional customer service, usually gets back to you within 1 hour
cons: Sizing runs small, so its advisable to order a few sizes and return the ones that don't fit

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've put in dozens of practices and games in these by now (6 months), and they work great for the price. The stitching has come loose in a few places when I try to pull them on tight as there is no wrist strap, however it so far has not affected the integrity of the gloves. Also, I am very pleased with how well these clean. I have cleaned them by hand and thrown them in the wash (to air dry) and no matter how muddy they are, they come out just as white as before. I am a female playing flag football and bought a youth size. Measured my hands based on the guide and these are pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves especially for the price, but after one week of use it's already started to rip at the seams, would at least want it to last a full season ******Update: I was contacted By a EliteTek customer support and they sent me out a updated new pair, they changed the stitching on it that doesn't rip as easily as before, so far they are in perfect condition. ******Update 2: Season is now over and I'm happy to report they are in near perfect condition and ready to use next season, although we did lose in the championship Game :( Clear Eyes Full Hearts Cant Lose
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 8 year old. Bought the XXS bc I wanted it fit tight, like it would fit older kids/adults. Way to small maybe should have gotten the XS. Now, my 5 year old year wears them, playing catch, riding bikes, etc. even wears them when using sidewalk chalk to draw stuff on the drive way. It’s about 1/2 inch too long but the tightness of the rest of the glove, makes it comfortable for him. 5 year old logic???? Lol. But he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight1911

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality gloves. Wore these gloves for the first time two days ago in my flag football league and within the first 30 minute half, the top sticky layer on my thumb had already started peeling off. Extremely disappointed with the quality of the gloves and the poor customer service I received! Also, the sizing chart is not accurate as I am an XL according to the chart but I probably would have been better off going with a large because the gloves were loose enough to slide around when catching some passes.
customer_reviews.author: RF3

customer_reviews.title: Size down but then hand part is tight
customer_reviews.text: I got the xsmall because the small at modells was too big for my 5 year old flag player who needed these because the other kids had them :/ haha. These xsmall are the same size as modells small.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Finally.  Gloves that fit.
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 8 and I must have bought several various brands of football gloves. All of them, no matter what size I purchased, were too long in the fingers. Not these. I used the measuring chart they suggested to measure his hands and ordered accordingly. PERFEECT fit. He COULD NOT be more happy!!!. The only thing I would note, is that his size, XS, the gloves don't have a velcro strap. The gloves just slip on, which can make them a little difficult to get on. However, that is a small price to pay, to finally find gloves that fit. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service - update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my son to use playing flag football. He initially loved the gloves, but after playing just one game, the plastic coating on the glove began peeling. One entire finger is now without the outer plastic coating. UPDATE: I received a new pair of gloves from the seller, and they have been fantastic. 5 stars for a quality product and a company that stands by their product and offers exceptional service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lairson

customer_reviews.title: Good But. . .
customer_reviews.text: The gloves were sticky, like they should be, but within a couple of weeks they ripped on the seam. I contacted the company and they sent a new pair right away. The new pair lasted a few more weeks this time but, ripped again on the seam. I'll be contacting the company again to see if they stand behind their product. If they don't stand behind their product I will lower the star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Happy to see me

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money!!!#!##
customer_reviews.text: The gloves started to come apart at the seams within two games.......the gloves are cheaply made and I will never buy or recommend this product...... Update, the company contacted me to make good on the product I must say the gloves they sent him worked out perfectly and we are happy with the product....Update 8/20/2017, the company sent a replacement pair gloves that that came apart in the same place within two practices.. The gloves are trashed do not waste your time or money... Very cheaply made product great grip poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: and are nice and tacky (helps with pulling flags out too)
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son really well, he's 6 years old, and around 30% on the 'growth curve' (that should help other parents gauge his size) - most gloves stores carry were too big for him, these fit 'like a glove'. Held up well through a flag football season, and are nice and tacky (helps with pulling flags out too). He'll probably outgrow them before spring ball, but they served their purpose. (Extra small size)
customer_reviews.author: Skigazzi

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves 'Em
customer_reviews.text: My son has a 5" long hand and the Youth XS is perfect. They are a little big but still work great and he has room to grow. We just use them to play catch so it does make throwing it back to me a little harder but that would be expected. Also they can be hard to get on so he gets frustrated but again they are supposed to be skin tight so that should be expected. He really enjoys wearing them and they have definitely helped him to start catching the ball with his hands rather than trapping it against his body
customer_reviews.author: S. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: They are definitely smaller than other gloves which is good because the youth gloves are always very large on ...
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely smaller than other gloves which is good because the youth gloves are always very large on my son. He is 7 and small, wears a size 6 for clothes and is about 45 pounds. I ordered a small and it was the right size for him. The XS would've been too small and would be good for preschool age. The only negative is they are hard to get on and off because they are pull on and there is no Velcro strap. I wish they would add one then I could give them 5 stars. But we are able to get them on, he just often needs my help.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Don't use for curling as they peal during the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't use for curling as they peal during the first use. I use them for curling. All the little bits of black and green on the ice creates a big problem. They are still sticky after they peal which may not make a difference for use on a football field. However in the "House" (the target area in curling), sticky bits of plastic on the ice surface creates very angry opponents.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Messinger

customer_reviews.title: Sticky gloves that really stick!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! I bought these mainly because the gloves of the reviews and how form fitting the gloves would be so it felt like you were catching the football with your hands without all the added cushioning. The grip is insane! Ive made some many incredible catches because of these gloves. Unfortionately, the gloves did start to demonstrate some seam issues but I emailed the company where they responded promptly and shipped over a pair of gloves. This company REALY stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Sadia

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit! Son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My kid is over the moon with these. I was surprised that the measurements are so great. I measured my kid's hands as suggested and the gloves fit perfectly. The colors really work for my son! Thanks for a great product that appeals to kids and has a great fit and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they look and feel like they are very well made
customer_reviews.text: I had put down an adult small when I first ordered it and then my computer had a glitch when I reviewed my order and placed it and I guess it somehow got changed to a youth small. Lol. Suffice to say I was very surprised when they got here and were a lot smaller than what I was anticipating. Oh well, I'll just give those to my nephew and order mystepson another pair. Other than that they look and feel like they are very well made. I'm sure both boys will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: I never bought football gloves before so I really did not know what to expect. But, I am very pleased with the gloves. At first, I thought it was going to be tight because I had a little trouble getting my hand to go into the glove. The wrist part does not stretch well, nor is it adjustable. But once I got it in, it felt very comfortable. It was not tight but just right. The texture and look of it is amazing. So far, I am very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: FIT
customer_reviews.text: Second year I've purchased these gloves for my grandson(age 12) and he loves them....won't play without, probably a mental thing. He has a small hand but the fit is good and tight. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vern Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed some gloves for flag football and came across these. They fit perfect (XL) and have worked great for me. You can also use a sharpie to color certain lines to make numbers. I would suggest buying these. Great price as well. Any issues come up, will update.
customer_reviews.author: |Amazon_User|

customer_reviews.title: Great looking as well as great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old grandson wanted these since he plays football at school. He really liked the way these loves looked. Once received, he liked them even more! They look goo and are great feeling and fitting.
customer_reviews.author: lora l.

customer_reviews.title: The good and the bad...
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are right...these gloves are the best my 11 year old has had in his first 3 plus seasons of tackle football but they are incredibly hard to get on. The glove fits true across the palm and the sizing guide is appropriate. There is no Velcro enclosure like all the others, just a neoprene-like opening to squeeze a hand in. If you have really wide hands, I might recommend sizing up or the glove won't get on.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty snug when first tryin* them on but for my 9 year old boy, his little hands needed something snug with out the long fingers leaving extra length. They don’t sale pee wee gloves in stores for his size and I needed them to fit perfect so he can catch the ball properly. Over time it got easier for him to put on with out me helping him
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: 6 years of buying gloves, these are the ones for us going forward
customer_reviews.text: Been buying gloves for my boy for 6 years now, flag and then tackle, these are the best that we’ve found for performance/durability/price. They say tight fitting and that’s no lie, some may need to go a size up if you are close in current size.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken

customer_reviews.title: I Use Them For CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I use these to save my hands during intensive CrossFit workouts. Better than grips and saves hands on bar muscle ups, chest to bars, and toes to bars. Cheap enough I will buy another pair when they break, but so far it has held up well to the Open 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Sportsharks

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional deal and he loves them more than the $100 gloves
customer_reviews.text: He is a pretty picky young man so I bought these is a med and large bcuz I wasn't sure how the fit would be. He loves them. I was concerned about not having Velcro straps, he likes his gloves real sug at his wrist but he loves them. Colors are nice and grip is as good as the $100 gloves I bought last year. We kept the large ones so he can wear them as he grows out of these. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Machelle Ford Ferry

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for your toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Searched everywhere for gloves for my 5 year old. Tried Nike and Wal-Marts "XXS" which did not come close to fitting properly. Took a shot on these and was not disappointed. Fit to the very tips of his fingers perfectly with enough room for them to grow during the season. Quality is real good. ALSO GREAT that these do not have that very distracting and unnecessary Velcro strap. Cause as like most kids, mine can become distracted very easily. Overall: I highly recommended these gloves
customer_reviews.author: Mr. McFly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good gripping.
customer_reviews.text: Good grip for catching slippery footballs. My 7 year old grandson received these and loves them. Bought XXS but he’s not a big kid. A little hard to get on at first but now he does it easily.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and design
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very good. They have a lot of grip to catch the football. They are tight to get on but it is a good thing because they don’t have a strap so they must be tight to stay on. They aren’t too tight though, they are very comfortable. The sizes are spot on with the chart. Mine fit perfectly. The design is very good and the grip part doesn’t peel off if you use it right. The other people who review and say quality is bad just don’t treat the product well or use it right. Would recommend these gloves for football/flag football.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you are looking
customer_reviews.text: My 11y old son puts the gloves on and turns into a nfl player every time!!! They are extremely nice and well made. Grip is perfect and the design is nice also!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel and kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY football gloves my boys will use! They fit really well (like a second skin) and grip well too! Every time they grow out of one....we buy another! We must’ve purchased about 6 of these already! It is really hard to find football gloves that fit my kiddos well (7yo & 12yo now)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son has loved these gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved these gloves. They are a great price! Next year I'll buy two so he can have a practice pair and a game pair.
customer_reviews.author: NRC

customer_reviews.title: Very hard for child to put on
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to return these. They worked great but really could benefit from a strap at the wrist to help get them on. Very easy to rip as you try to pull them on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to wear during intramural football at my college. They definitely gave me a better grip and helped me to catch some balls that otherwise would of been incompletes. Additionally when i first got them they seemed to have a better grip then some of the upper brands such as under armor. However after about a month of use the tacky layer started peeling from the finger tips on down. Certainly a lesser end brand but they were worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Axelrod

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy... they peel!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair one for my 10 yr old and one for my 8 yr old who both play extreme flag football... they only wore these gloves 3 times and already the shinny/sticky side to the gloves are completely peeling off.... my son got the ones with neon green becuase it matches his jersey and thats whats peeling all off... disappointed... don't but. Also the stick is already gone. Only had a week now. Returning both pair and going back to buying underarmor!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda  Ventresca

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this garbage, gloves destroyed in less than 30 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not cheap. They work really good for the 45 minutes they lasted. My son was the starting center for his football team. They didn't last through one game. For that much money, they should last a season.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Catching a Football
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while for this product to arrive, fault was with the post office. When it did arrive, my six year old grandson was extremely excited. He plays football for the Centerville Wee Elks and the weather is starting to get a wee bit cool here in Ohio. The gloves fit him perfectly. He started practicing catching the football while wearing the gloves and had no problem in catching the football. He was one very happy little guy.
customer_reviews.author: sherlockmarcy

customer_reviews.title: Worn twice and already peeling!
customer_reviews.text: We seldom write reviews, but I was compelled to share my experience with these football gloves. By the second time my son used for flag football practice, there was peeling of the shiny outer layer, making the gloves look worn and unattractive. I put them in a safe, climate-controlled space in between practices and still... they weren’t the most inexpensive gloves, so I thought it would be okay for at least the rest of the season. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: A&J

customer_reviews.title: Sticky gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a thanksgiving football game. It was raining before we started so I wasn’t sure how these would work. I was the only one who wasn’t dropping the football. I was pleasantly surprised. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: He likes them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He likes them a lot. After a few months of using he asked for a new pair in a different color. We purchased red and they look exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: D. McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: My son is 64lbs. The fit was fine, maybe 1cm long in the fingers. I don't remember the size I ordered but I'm sure it was the smallest. The problem was the durability. He did not use them every day. He used them for 1-2 hours per day about 3 days per week and the material in the palms that allows for "sticky" catches peeled off. Also they were coming apart at the seems in 3 places. This occurred within 5 weeks of very limited use just tossing the ball at home, not during football games or practice.
customer_reviews.author: Fishinggent

customer_reviews.title: So So product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5-6 year old to use for flag football. The gloves fit decently in the palm but are too long in the fingers. Fingers are length for 8-9 year olds. Also since there is not elastic to tighten around the wrist the gloves tend to come loose and slide. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Go Hokies

customer_reviews.title: (Updated - see write up) Stinks and after two washes, stitching coming undone
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Customer Service contacted me without me initiating it because of my comment regarding the tear. They said they had a defect and have since fixed it and would like to know if they could send me a replacement pair. I received the new pair pretty quickly and so far it's been holding up! Thanks for the excellent customer service and caring!!! They fit good, but they really STINK and when you wash them, they start fall apart. Only washed them twice and have had them for two weeks and the stitching is already coming undone. Same price as the name brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: True sizing, could use better reinforcement at wrists
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to find gloves to fit my 4 year old football player but these worked. Unfortunately they haven’t held up as well as I’d like, stitching has come loose resulting in hole at wrist cuffs making them harder to pull on.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Caraway

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for a great price. I only dropped a few in my flag football league that I have no business playing in. Without the gloves I was dropping a lot more, so it's either I'm not as athletic as I think I am, or the gloves worked. Either way, I'm just glad I'm not the dude that is reliving his high school gloay days and spatting up for an indoor flag football rec league.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Draper

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a size too big and it's a little too lose to get a great grip. They do say to measure so that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to actually measure your hand. Ordered a size too big and it's a little too lose to get a great grip. They do say to measure so that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: Muddasir Khan

customer_reviews.title: great wr gloves
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble in my tackle football league that when it got cold I would be dropping a couple of important mid field to long passes so I decided to get better gloves. my friend told me about these gloves and decided to try them. this past game I didn't drop a single pass and made two interceptions. great gloves
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I received the gloves for my grandson and they appear to meet the description. They are a Christmas gift and he will not get until Christmas. My grandson will have to try them out and let me know so I can update you all as to the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee0769

customer_reviews.title: Good for my flag footballer.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. This is only his second year playing football, so I wasn't sure what to try. I measured his hand and ordered a small according to the size chart. They fit perfectly. He's worn them for 2 games and a few practices so far, and he thinks they help. If they last for one season of flag football, I would definitely buy again as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoMommy

customer_reviews.title: Small sizes for small hands
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a glove to fit a smaller hand. These come small enough and they are grippy and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Steejo

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Glove fit my 4 year olds hand. Takes a bit to completely shove on to hand and finger tips were just a tad long but that's expected for such a small glove. Just pull down glove on each finger 1 at a time
customer_reviews.author: MARC RYAN EMMETT

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have held up well through 1 season on flag, bow we are in tackle football and still look the same as the day they arrived
customer_reviews.author: Sports mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Really Great receiver gloves. Helps out with some difficult and hard to reach passes, I now can catch with the my fingertips. Make sure to buy them tight fitting. Additionally EliteTek has amazing customer service. Definitely worth a try over the big market brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit. He Loves Them!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 and an XS. Tried two other brands costing more and they didn’t fit right to the point he didn’t want to wear them. Took a chance and ordered EliteTek. The fit was perfect, the fingers weren’t too long like on the others. He’s able to pull them on & off by himself. He Loves Them!! Really cool feature is the ability to block out the 88 to make his own personal jersey number on his gloves. Great job. We will be buying again next year if he moves up in size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim’s acct

customer_reviews.title: These gloves will really increase your youth's ability to catch and hold on to the football!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable youth football glove. Previous pair held up for 3 seasons ... so needed to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Betlach

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these in a size small because other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a size small because other reviews said they ran small.... I felt they were right on track and unfortunately too big for my 8 yr old son. I have since reordered the xs ( fingers crossed) i am hoping they fit his tiny hands...lol Update I would like to say that the customer service is on point! While they didn't fit my son's hand I was very pleased with the feedback revived by the company grade A
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Tired of emails requesting a review of product
customer_reviews.text: I’m only writing this review because I’m tired of the seller emailing me so frequently requesting a review. So for that reason the product is average. The real story is that the product was purchased as a gift and I no longer have it. So pretty frustrating getting emailed until I do this just to stop it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect durable feels good sons loves them color is great really helps grasp the ball
customer_reviews.author: tiffney lang nunn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Youth gloves fit my son great, make sure you measure before purchasing - 4 star due to white gloves with black number, we weren't able to draw in his number like the white numbers on black gloves with a sharpie. Overall happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised how small the gloves were. We ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how small the gloves were. We ordered two pairs and the ones for my 10 year old ended up fitting my 6 year old (we cancelled the other order). They got easier to get on/off after a few times, but unfortunately they didn't last longer than a week. We've had them for four days and the grip on each palm is tearing and separating from the glove. After reading a few other similar reviews we requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but still are great gloves from I can tell
customer_reviews.text: They don't work well for what I bought them for (frisbee), but still are great gloves from I can tell. Very fitted. And if they're used for football as designed, I believe they would provide a lot of grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ain't Nobody Got Time to Review

customer_reviews.title: Great, but tend to slip
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, really sticky I use them for working out in the gym, only negative is the tend to slip down your wrist more than a Velcro version but it's all good. Great for what I wanted. I used to be a all county WR and I would not use them on the field. But that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great loves for good price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son and he loves them. They’re a little tight putting them on but when they’re on they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: aseldom

customer_reviews.title: Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Were not comfortable at all. Smelled terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Manshum

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smallest size available, and they were still too big for my average size 5 year old. These are probably for an average 7 year old
customer_reviews.author: andrea miller

customer_reviews.title: Elite Tek RG GLoves
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these gloves my son plays U12 Flag football and made a HUGE difference in catching... to the point he is trying to catch it with one hand. We have washed them in the washer on warm and let them air dry. They have held up really good and would purchase them again if he out grows them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to use these in the NFL
customer_reviews.text: The price was good but these gloves are not equivalent to a higher end product. I use these in a co-rec flag football league so I wanted something inexpensive seeing that I use them 5 times a year. The hands are tacky, but not as tacky as some of the other name brand gloves I've tried. The wrists also don't have velcro so it's a little tough to get the gloves on and off quick. Overall you get a good product for a very good price, but don't expect to see these being used on Sundays in the NFL.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJak

customer_reviews.title: waste of money !!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these gloves it's a waste of money. My son has had these for a week and they look like he used them for a whole season. And they have a hole in them . I would return them but Amazon be on some bull. Because if I went to an actual store you better believe I would be in right back at it.
customer_reviews.author: Joygyrl

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on and off but boys love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them but they are hard for them to get on and off due to the fact that they do not have any Velcro around the wrist area
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely_Kess

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son wore these for practices only as he hadn't had a game yet. That being said, a thumb was ripped off during practice and two fingers ripped. On a positive note, he said they fit his hands great. Edit: the company told me I may have gotten a defective pair of gloves. Monday My son should have a new pair and I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: january

customer_reviews.title: CHART ISNT ACCURATE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves for the upcoming football season. I looked at the graph and even messured my own hand so that I knew wich size would fit best. when I got them they were so small, to the point where I couldn't put them on my hands. other than the size they feel and work like a charm, just remember to order very large.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pattani

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are decent. They fit, sometimes a little hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: mantrum9

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is too small. Terrible. While the fingers fit, the wrist is waaay too small/narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Practical in NYC!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and my son loves catching the football with these
customer_reviews.author: G. Turrent

customer_reviews.title: Great small size!
customer_reviews.text: Actually fit my child who has small hands! Have looked forever for gloves that fit and finally found them. They are nice and tacky and help with catching.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: He says their fine but they look like they aren't on all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars but they run smaller than most other brands, my son had a pair of under armor youth small and they would barely stay on they were so big. We saw these and got them one size smaller and they barely got to his wrist when he puts them on. He says their fine but they look like they aren't on all the way but that's all they got. They do the job and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: angel de leon

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his gloves and the made it through the season.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: This pair of elitek gloves are fantastic. I've just taken them out of the box and they are extremely sticky. I'll use these only at practice since they don't have the sticker to use in the CALIFORNIA COASTAL STATE CCS league. I'm pretty annoyed that I still haven't gotten my visor.
customer_reviews.author: Benson Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves for the price. They have really good grip. They're very light and not for extreme weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Frank

customer_reviews.title: Finally a glove for youths!
customer_reviews.text: These are tight as others have stated...My son is 7 1/2 and on the smaller size, but has thick hands. They are tight and his fingers are still 1/2" from end of glove. His friend has thinner hands and they fit well. He likes the fit, but struggles to get them on. Doesn't really affect his throwing right now too much...maybe we'll just remove one glove when he's QB.
customer_reviews.author: S. Althouse

customer_reviews.title: My 10. 5 year old son loves these football ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10.5 year old son loves these football gloves. Everyone in his class wants them! They fit tightly on his hands, but unfortunately I forgot the size I bought him. He says he likes that they are tight because once on they feel and fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy0406

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my kindergartener playing Flag football during this Winter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my kindergartener playing Flag football during this Winter season; he loves it and only wears EliteTek over other (UA and Nike) gloves he has. I personally think though, the wrist area seems too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son uses them for all star football and loves them... great grip on the ball he said
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove just a little small for the size..so if your son wears a medium get a large...other than that ..it is a great item for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits age 5
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son wears these in football and they fit well. Nice grip with rubber palm side. Needs help getting them on, but it's never a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: bbennett

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cheap football gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to use in the pick up games of football on my campus and I don't regret buying them. I immediately saw an improvement in my playing. They are comfortable and work just as well as other gloves that cost way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, they make my grandson want to play catch and that is a hard thing to do now a days with video games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touch Down
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. They really help him catching the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: Originally ordered size medium for my great grandson and they were too small
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered size medium for my great grandson and they were too small, returned them and was delighted with their return policy which was quick and efficient. Ordered the next size up and received them just as quickly and efficiently. Will patronize again if any of my other great grands go into sports.😊
customer_reviews.author: Monti3

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these gloves for flag football, he is 8, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I may have to update this post once ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I may have to update this post once my boyfriend actually plays in them. He’s practiced in them a couple of times and thought that for the price it was good quality. They fit right to his hands (XL) and they seems sticky.
customer_reviews.author: AJAY

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Glove... Made for Little Hands (XS Size Review)
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time finding high quality gloves to fit the hands of a 5 year old. Even the small gloves from other companies were to big. These size XS fit extremely well. Our little guy is catching MUCH better as a result. The gloves are great and very sticky but the mental advantage is pretty huge too.
customer_reviews.author: Sean4reviews

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy.
customer_reviews.text: Made my 6 year old feel pro for his flag football games.fit well.good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves. I bought these gloves for my son and he loves them. As soon as they arrived he put them on and we put them to the test. The football sticks to them. Just remember the gloves will not catch the ball for you that part still depends on you, but they will slow it down giving you a little more reaction time to catch the ball.
customer_reviews.author: StallionRev

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality BUT run small
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are nice quality but they run extremely small. Ordered them for my son who plays high school football and they were so small we returned them. Should've ordered an extra large maybe. They arrived quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves! Ordering More Now!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves were awesome. Great fit. My son just wasn't used to playing in them and didn't utilize them too much this season. Therefore I can't adequately judge the durability level of them. But I'm actually going to order a second pair now for his upcoming season!
customer_reviews.author: W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: he was disappointed because he really liked them
customer_reviews.text: the small youth is too small for my 6 yr.old,he was disappointed because he really liked them.probably be nice gloves had he got to use them.to much hassle to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ar

customer_reviews.title: They are good so far and he loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6 yr old. He has small hands. They are good so far and he loves them. They have not come apart like the other gloves that i read reviews of though. He has been using them for about a month and HE LOVES em. Small kids + Small hands + as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the crossfit gloves because these fit perfectly and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for climbing the rope at crossfit. Way better than the crossfit gloves because these fit perfectly and are not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.author: AMB1976

customer_reviews.title: Great tight fighting and sticky
customer_reviews.text: Loved how sticky they are/were. He wears them nearly every day for football at recess and after school, so they are wearing down, but I think they were well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: My Son Where's them ALL the TIME!
customer_reviews.text: My Son Where's them ALL the TIME! He got them just in time for the Start of Flagfootball and absolutely loves them! The kids at football practice are demanding them from their parents as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cambodia K

product_meta.title: EliteTek RG-14 Football Gloves - Youth Football Gloves - Football Gloves Kids - Football Gloves Men
feature_bullets: ✅ STICKY GRIP - RG-14 Gloves are SFIA Certified. Our GripTech Palm Technology has the right amount of tacky grip to enhance every play. Performs under any weather conditions! Play like the pros, rain-or-shine. If your athlete feels enhanced grip is needed, a quick application of EliteTek Grip Drip on these durable gloves will keep the glove performance optimal.

✅ TIGHT FITTING - These football glove's are skin tight! Feels like you’re not wearing a glove at all. Gloves are meant to be extremely tight fitting. - Please check size chart photo. Lightweight enough to keep your hands moisture-free in hot and humid temperatures so you can focus on your game. A better feel and thin design offers responsive performance that puts you in control and enhances your skills. Get that competitive edge while competing.

✅ QUALITY - With over 800 Amazon reviews, we have worked constantly to improve our gloves. Specialized stitching at all stress points, these gloves are battle tested on the gridiron! These adult & kids football gloves are perfect for bringing in a clean catch without fumble. These gloves allow confidence in your equipment so you can focus on what matters most, competing at your highest level.

✅ YOUTH AND ADULT SIZES - Our gloves range from Youth XXS to Adult XL. This means no matter what your age or size - we have a size for you! See size chart image for exact measurements. If you're fit isn't perfect, we'll replace with a new size, no questions asked!

✅ 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - EliteTek Gloves are backed by 100% guarantee that you are fully satisfied with your product or receive your money back. EliteTek is a San Diego, CA, USA based company that prides itself on excellent customer service. If you are not fully satisfied with your product, contact us for an immediate replacement or full refund.
